title: Mobile Developer
description: I'm a Mobile Developer with more than four years of working experience that includes application development, customization, and up-gradation modernization support. I have extensive mobile (Flutter, React Native, Android) application development experience in domains such as Finance, E-commerce, Healthcare, Education, and other fields. I take pride in always being self-motivated, hardworking, responsible, courageous under fire as well as in my constant efforts to better my professional skills.
